item.title: Victoria Beckham Gets Emotional Over Forging a Path in Fashion in Netflix Docuseries Trailer
item.description: Eva Longoria, Anna Wintour and, of course, husband David Beckham also feature in the new three-part doc hitting the platform Oct. 9.
